answers.author: David Evertsen
answers.text:
Bob Hoffmann is a former City Manager of the Year in New Jersey. He is widely respected as a foremost expert in municipal fleet conversion to biofuels, gas-electric hybrids and fleet management. He has been interviewed by various national news agencies and TV shows, and he would be available to speak with you at your convenience. He is highly technical, but also very practical and very easy to understand.  He is  a Municipal Solutions Senior Associate and Board Member, who has assisted several of our clients assess and develop custom strategies for their fleets, and he is also on the Executive Board for the NJMMA.  
I think we can send you a couple Final Reports from our Fleet Management Studies - which includes some pretty innovative stuff.  Give Bob a call at 201.674.5009 and tell him I recommended that the two of you connect.  
David  A Evertsen, Principal  
Municipal Solutions, LLC  
928.220.2611  
devertsen@municipalsolutions.org

author: Kathryn Hertel
text: We are embarking on a Climate Energy Action Plan, a component of which is a a Fleet Transformation Plan.  We are hoping our Fleet Plan will lead the way to helping us invest in cleaner fuels, better methods of driving, etc.  Does anyone have experience developing such a fleet transformation plan?  What are the obstacles?  What results did you achieve?  Any help our thoughts you can provide would be much appreciated.
title: Municipal Fleet Transformation Plan
